com.impinj.octane

Class ImpinjReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.impinj.octane.ImpinjReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeepaliveTimeoutListener, org.llrp.ltk.net.LLRPEndpoint

    public class ImpinjReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.llrp.ltk.net.LLRPEndpoint, KeepaliveTimeoutListener
    This is the main class for the Octane SDK Java. This class contains all the methods used to interact with a single reader.

        public int getMessageTimeout()
        Returns:
        The current setting for the message timeout in msec

      • setMessageTimeout

        public void setMessageTimeout(int messageTimeoutMsec)
        Parameters:
        messageTimeoutMsec - -- set the message timeout for all interactions with the reader. If a message is sent to the reader and a response is not received by messageTime milliseconds later, the SDK will throw an exception

      • setTagReportListener

        public void setTagReportListener(TagReportListener tagReportListener)
        Sets the tag report listener. This listener enables the application to get notified when tag report arrive from the reader.
        Parameters:
        tagReportListener - the listener object to receive events
        See Also:
        TagReport

      • removeTagReportListener

        public void removeTagReportListener()
        Removes the tag report listener. After removal, the application will no longer get tag reports from the reader.

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)
        Assigns a name to this reader. For example, "Dock Door #1 Reader". This name can be used to identify a particular reader in an application that controls multiple readers.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to assign to this reader

      • connect

        public void connect()
             throws OctaneSdkException
        Connect (unsecured) to an Impinj RFID reader using the default LLRP port (5084). The Address property must be set prior to calling this method.
        Throws:
        OctaneSdkException - when the connection attempt fails or if the Address property has not been set.

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String address)
             throws OctaneSdkException
        Connect (unsecured) to an Impinj RFID reader using the default LLRP port (5084).
        Parameters:
        address - -- address or hostname of the reader
        Throws:
        OctaneSdkException - if the connection attempt fails

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String address,
           boolean useTLS)
             throws OctaneSdkException
        Connect to an Impinj RFID reader using the default LLRP port (5084).
        Parameters:
        address - -- address or hostname of the reader
        Throws:
        OctaneSdkException - if the connection attempt fails

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String address,
           int port)
             throws OctaneSdkException
        Connect (unsecured) to an Impinj RFID reader.
        Parameters:
        address - -- the address or hostname of the reader
        port - -- the TCP port number of the LLRP service
        Throws:
        OctaneSdkException - when the connection atttempt fails

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String address,
           int port,
           boolean useTLS)
             throws OctaneSdkException
        Connect to an Impinj RFID reader.
        Parameters:
        address - -- the address or hostname of the reader
        port - -- the TCP port number of the LLRP service
        useTLS - -- enable TLS encryption if "true"
        Throws:
        OctaneSdkException - when the connection atttempt fails

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Returns:
        true if a connection to this reader exists

      • queryFeatureSet

        public FeatureSet queryFeatureSet()
                           throws OctaneSdkException
        Queries the reader for a summary of the features that it supports.
        Returns:
        An object summarizing the features supported by the reader.
        Throws:
        OctaneSdkException - if the capabilities could not be discovered

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnects the LLRP connection to the reader

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws OctaneSdkException
        Stops the reader from its inventory. Tags will no longer be read.
        Throws:
        OctaneSdkException - if the reader cannot be stopped

      • start

        public void start()
           throws OctaneSdkException
        Starts the reader. Tag reports will be received asynchronously via an event.
        Throws:
        OctaneSdkException - if the Start method is called before connecting to a reader.
        See Also:
        TagReport

      • applyDefaultSettings

        public void applyDefaultSettings()
                          throws OctaneSdkException
        Applies the default settings to the reader.
        Throws:
        OctaneSdkException - if this method is called prior to establishing a connection with a reader.

      • applySettings

        public void applySettings(Settings settings)
                   throws OctaneSdkException
        Applies the provided settings to the reader.
        Parameters:
        settings - Settings to apply to the reader
        Throws:
        OctaneSdkException - if this method is called prior to establishing a connection with a reader, or if the settings are invalid.

                  throws OctaneSdkException

        Throws:
        OctaneSdkException - if the save fails

      • queryDefaultSettings

        public Settings queryDefaultSettings()
        Queries the default settings of the reader. NOTE the reader default settings may be different than the SDK default settings. In order to use the SDK default settings ensure you apply these settings
        Returns:
        the SDKs default reader settings
        See Also:
        applySettings(Settings)

      • querySettings

        public Settings querySettings()
                       throws OctaneSdkException
        This function queries the reader for its current settings.
        Returns:
        An object containing the current reader settings
        Throws:
        OctaneSdkException - if a communication error occurs while talking with the reader, the reader has not been configured, or if the configuration was not applied by the SDK

      • messageReceived

        public void messageReceived(org.llrp.ltk.types.LLRPMessage message)
        For internal use only to receive messages from the LLRP library
        Specified by:
        messageReceived in interface org.llrp.ltk.net.LLRPEndpoint
        Parameters:
        message - the LLRP message received by the reader

      • queryTags

        public void queryTags()
               throws OctaneSdkException
        Tells the reader to send all the tag reports it has buffered. The ReportMode should be set so that reader accumulates tag reads (WaitForQuery or BatchAfterStop).
        Throws:
        OctaneSdkException - when this method is called prior to establishing a connection with a reader.

      • addOpSequence

        public void addOpSequence(TagOpSequence sequence)
                   throws OctaneSdkException
        Adds a sequence of tag operations to the reader to perform during inventory
        Parameters:
        sequence - the sequence of operations to perform
        Throws:
        OctaneSdkException - if the sequence is invalid or could not be applied

      • enableOpSequence

        public void enableOpSequence(int sequenceId)
                      throws OctaneSdkException
        Enables the Tag Operation Sequence
        Parameters:
        sequenceId - the ID of the sequence to be enabled
        Throws:
        OctaneSdkException - if a communication error occurs while talking with the reader.
        See Also:
        TagOpSequence

      • deleteOpSequence

        public void deleteOpSequence(int sequenceId)
                      throws OctaneSdkException
        Deletes a tag operation sequence
        Parameters:
        sequenceId - the ID of the sequence to be disabled
        Throws:
        OctaneSdkException - if a communication error occurs while talking with the reader.
        See Also:
        TagOpSequence

      • deleteAllOpSequences

        public void deleteAllOpSequences()
                          throws OctaneSdkException
        Deletes all tag operation sequences from the reader
        Throws:
        OctaneSdkException - if the operation fails
        See Also:
        TagOpSequence

      • resumeEventsAndReports

        public void resumeEventsAndReports()
                            throws OctaneSdkException
        This function tells the reader to resume sending reports and events. Messages in the queue on the reader may then be sent.
        Throws:
        OctaneSdkException - if a communication error occurs while talking with the reader.
